alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wakulla, south central Gadsden, central Liberty and southwestern Leon Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles south of Greensboro, or 16 miles southwest of Quincy, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Crawfordville, Telogia, Lake Talquin, Leon Sinks, Lake Munson, Arran, Hosford, Hilliardville, Eight Mile Pond, Fort Braden, Clio, Silver Lake Rec Area, Lowry, Bloxham, Bethel and Wakulla Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida.
